title: Disconect in game and cant reconect
body:
I just got dced from a game and couldnt reconect....and its not the first time this happened. Got dced on my smurf and 20 mins after the dc the client still failed to reconect. All my other accs work fine.
To be honest it wouldnt bother me that much if i would not constantly receive leaver-busters for that sh_t.
My internet works fine...all other LoL accs work fine...only the one i dced on just wont work.
Talked to some friends of mine and they had the same issue aswell mutliple times.
Any advice or do i have to take the lower priority queues and surrender to my destiny?
